title: Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Tree and Sky (Recto); Rough Ocean on Cliff (Verso)", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description:
Recto: At left, single dark tree under rough, dark sky.
Verso: Rough ocean in foreground with cliff, at right, in midground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Tree and Sky (Recto); Rough Ocean on Cliff (Verso)", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-49.
